biotools.summary: MoMA-LoopSampler is a method to exhaustively sample the conformational space of protein loops. It exploits structural information encoded in a large library of three-residue fragments, and enforces loop-closure using a closed-form inverse kinematics (IK) solver. A novel reinforcement-learning-based approach is applied to accelerate sampling while preserving diversity.
